title: Ai Shimai 2: Futari no Kajitsu (Immoral Sisters 2)
synopsis: Rumi and Tomoko's father has returned, but he seems to have developed an uncontrollable urge for Tomoko, after seeing her all grown up. He tries to fight off his urges, and Takedo, in order to keep the family together.
related_anime: ['Ai Shimai Tsubomi... Kegashite Kudasai', 'Ai Shimai: Futari no Kajitsu']
